name: Bibimbap
description: A classic Korean rice bowl topped with assorted vegetables, beef, fried egg, and spicy gochujang sauce.

name: Bulgogi
description: Thinly sliced marinated beef grilled with onions and carrots, served with rice and kimchi.

name: Japchae
description: Sweet potato glass noodles stir-fried with beef and mixed vegetables in a savory soy-based sauce.

name: Kimchi Jjigae
description: Spicy stew made with aged kimchi, tofu, pork, and scallions, served with a side of steamed rice.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Chewy rice cakes cooked in a spicy-sweet red pepper sauce, topped with fish cakes and boiled eggs.

name: Samgyeopsal
description: Grilled pork belly slices served with lettuce wraps, garlic, and dipping sauces.

name: Haemul Pajeon
description: Savory Korean seafood pancake made with green onions, squid, and shrimp, served with soy dipping sauce.

name: Sundubu Jjigae
description: Hot and spicy soft tofu stew with seafood or beef, egg, and vegetables in a rich broth.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
description: Stir-fried rice with kimchi, vegetables, and egg, with an optional topping of spam or pork.

name: Soju
description: Traditional Korean distilled spirit made from rice, barley, or sweet potatoes. Served chilled.

name: Makgeolli
description: Lightly sparkling Korean rice wine with a creamy texture and slightly sweet flavor.

name: Banchan Set
description: Assorted side dishes including kimchi, pickled radish, bean sprouts, and spinach.
